title: Traceability Matrix & Verification-VValidation Plan
summary: Map requirements to tests and provide traceability for critical controls.
description: Create a traceability matrix that maps requirement IDs to specific unit/integration/e2e tests and identify gaps in coverage. Produce a `VVP-TRACEABILITY.md` file under `docs/design`.

components.name: Traceability Matrix
components.responsibility: Document mapping between REQ IDs and test cases.

components.name: Test Gap Analysis
components.responsibility: Identify missing tests for critical controls and create tasks to add them.

interactions: Developers reference the matrix when adding features or tests.
CI and reviewers use the matrix to validate acceptance for PRs tied to requirements.
New tests update the matrix to show resolved gaps.
acceptance_criteria: A `VVP-TRACEABILITY.md` exists linking REQ IDs to tests.
All critical controls have at least one automated test mapping.
Open gaps are tracked as issues with owner and ETA.
tasks: Create `docs/design/VVP-TRACEABILITY.md` with initial mappings for high-impact REQ IDs.
Run test coverage and produce a gap list for critical controls.
Create issue(s) for missing critical tests and add to the master plan.
